name: adidas Stan Smith Bape 30th Anniversary White

details.description:
The adidas Stan Smith Bape 30th Anniversary White is a celebratory sneaker designed in a collaboration between adidas and A Bathing Ape. This sneaker commemorates the 30th anniversary of the iconic Japanese streetwear label.

This adidas Stan Smith silhouette features an upper of white leather. The signature 3-stripes are formed by lines of perforations coursing down the side panel. A leather heel tab in Bape’s classic camo pattern in hues of tan, brown, black, and green sports shiny-gold debossed Stan Smith trefoil branding on one shoe and Bape Sta branding on the other. We see gold again on the tongue tag with its dual branding and on the side panel with the Stan Smith branding. The off-white rubber cup sole with tonal stitching features embossed adidas branding on the sidewall. The tonal rubber outsole has a tread pattern of small circles bunched together.

Our favorite detail of this jubilant sneaker is the gold "30" lace jewel that offers birthday bling. The adidas Stan Smith Bape 30th Anniversary White was released on November 18, 2023, for $160 retail.

name: adidas Stan Smith Bape ABC Camo

details.description:
The adidas Stan Smith Bape ABC Camo was released to mark 30 years of the brands' collaboration. This limited edition has a 30th-anniversary lace jewel and combines the classic tennis shoe profile with Bape's iconic camo pattern.

The Bspe ABC Camo adidas Stan Smith has a playful look, typical of the Tokyo flavor of the Bape's premium artwork. It has an all-camo upper, with an off-white sole. It's nicely flexible and very comfortable. "Stan Smith" is written in gold on the side, and the ice-white ankle collar is embossed with a commemorative Bape logo, also in gold. The Bape collab and the limited edition 30th anniversary iconography make it a definite collectible for supporters of both brands.

We really like this reimagined version of one of the most popular tennis shoes of all time. The minimalist profile is an ideal canvas for the Bape camo, displaying the design to max effect. The adidas Stan Smith Bape ABC Camo was released on 10 February 2021, at a retail price of $160.

name: adidas Stan Smith Golf Bape 30th Anniversary
adidas Stan Smith CLOT By Edison Chen Night Navy Beads
Balenciaga x adidas Stan Smith Black

details.description:
The Balenciaga x adidas Stan Smith Black is a low top athletic shoe in a monochrome Core Black colorway. The leather upper features adidas’ signature three stripes as perforations on the sides. Balenciaga x adidas branding appears on the tongue and heel tab, along with handwritten 42 branding on the Core Black midsole.

German sneaker brand adidas is Europe’s largest athletic shoe producer, with a lineage that dates to 1924. Balenciaga is a Paris-based fashion house that originated in San Sebastián, Spain, in 1919, with Demna Gvasalia at the helm of Creative Direction since 2015. Balenciaga is known for its avant direction, as is evidenced by their transformation of adidas’ Stan Smith from its signature athletic white and green to entirely Core Black.

Our experts feel that the best feature of the Balenciaga x adidas Stan Smith is its monochrome Core Black color palette, which makes it highly versatile. The Balenciaga x adidas Stan Smith Black released on November 3, 2022, and retailed at $850 upon release.

name: Balenciaga x adidas Stan Smith Worn-Out Black

details.description:
The Balenciaga x adidas Stan Smith Worn-Out Black is a worn-out looking sneaker from the adidas Stan Smith line that was the result of collaboration between Balenciaga and adidas.

Presenting in a foot conforming and slim design, the upper of this sneaker is Core Black leather that appears as if the shoe has already been worn for quite some time. The black heel collar is equally distressed looking, as if someone has repeated used the other foot upon the heel to get the shoe off. The heel sports both brand’s logos, as does the insole and a tongue patch. The midsole and outsole have a worn-out look, complete with scrapes and scuffs.

What sticks out the most about this shoe is form the three stripes take, since they appear as three rows of perforated holes on both sides of the shoe, which adds breathability while still staying on brand. The Balenciaga x adidas Stan Smith Worn-Out Black retailed for $850 when it hit the shelves on November 3, 2022.

name: Balenciaga x adidas Stan Smith Core White Green
adidas Stan Smith Brain Dead Bliss
adidas Stan Smith Forever PRIMEGREEN White
adidas Stan Smith Bape 30th Anniversary Black
adidas Stan Smith Primegreen Collegiate Green
adidas Stan Smith Triple White

details.description:
The minimalist design of the adidas Stan Smith makes it a clean sneaker, regardless of which colors are put on it. But the adidas Stan Smith Triple White is one of the cleanest options of the bunch thanks to the bright shades of white utilized on it.

Just like other Stan Smiths, this one has a white leather upper with white laces, a white midsole and outsole, and white adidas branding scattered throughout it. But what separates it from other Stan Smiths is that everything else on this shoe is white, too, including its tongue and heel tab. They're typically covered in other colors to provide contrast for the white on the upper, but they're done up in white here.

Our sneaker experts love how clean these Stan Smiths look because of all the white used to create them. The white gives the Stan Smith silhouette an opportunity to shine even more than usual. The adidas Stan Smith Triple White was released on June 15, 2023, when it retailed for $80.

name: adidas adiFOM Stan Smith Mule Sand Lucid Pink (Women's)
adidas Stan Smith Valentine's Day (2024) (Women's)
adidas Stan Smith Kermit

details.description: The adidas Stan Smith Kermit is a limited edition sneaker that pays homage to the iconic Muppet character. The shoe features a white leather upper with green accents on the heel tab, tongue, and insole. The Kermit graphic is prominently displayed on the tongue, adding a playful touch to the classic silhouette. The shoe is constructed with premium materials, including a rubber outsole for durability and traction. The release date for this shoe was April 3, 2021, and it retailed for $90. This sneaker is a must-have for fans of the adidas Stan Smith and Kermit the Frog, and it's sure to turn heads with its unique design.
